amendment.description: An amendment numbered 110 printed in Part B of House Report 118-272 to prohibit funds from being used for a Confucius Classroom.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hern amendment (A053) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Hern amendment (A053) Agreed to by voice vote.
